title: Remove Aatrox off of my account.
body:
I have not played in almost 2 months because I really just don't enjoy the game anymore so this isn't too much of a big deal. Aside from that, I had leftover Riot Points and used them on a Hextech Key. I then used that key to unlock one of my chests and pulled an Aurelion Sol champion shard, that was added to my already 2 other champion shards and I decided to re-roll them into a champion permanently. I got Aatrox from this......

AATROX.

I always hear about how you can submit a ticket to get a champion removed off of your account but I was never sure if it was confirmed. With that I'm asking either where I can submit this or if any Rioter reads this they can do it for me.

**I am not asking for any refund I just don't want him on my account lol me and my friends have joked about him for years as a funny and bad champion (our own opinion, which is also a popular one) and I know I just don't have to use him whenever I return to playing but seeing the Darkin Blade on my champion list just is eh... i'll pass lol

http://imgur.com/eM8KoDN
